content: the crochet acorn ornament is a quick and fun way to add a touch of nature to your tree - without the squirrel trouble featuring bernat maker minis this tiny hanging crochet christmas tree ornament or present topper whips up fast an acorn ornament symbolizes good luck new beginnings the gift of life and good fortune - something we all could use more of in the new year the crochet acorn ornament is a quick and fun way to add a touch of nature to your tree - without the squirrel trouble featuring bernat maker minis this tiny hanging crochet christmas tree ornament or present topper whips up fast an acorn ornament symbolizes good luck new beginnings the gift of life and good fortune - something we all could use more of in the new year
